translations: （Appel）人名；（意、西、罗、瑞典、捷、芬、英、法、丹、德）阿佩尔

sentences.sentence: Well, gentlemen, you are about to see a baked Appel.
sentences.translation: 好吧，先生们，你们将看到一个烤熟了的。

sentences.sentence: In 2002 I invited Appel to our Caribbean Camp as a guest instructor.
sentences.translation: 2002年我邀请阿佩尔去加勒比海的训练营做客席指导。

sentences.sentence: Moving Average Convergence-Divergence (MACD) is an indicator invented by Gerald Appel (Chapter 7).
sentences.translation: MACD指标是杰拉尔德·阿佩尔发明的（第07章）。
